definitions.title: vb. Hoph.
definitions.body: be twisted (NH [[שָׁזַר]] twist; cf. Ar. 4azara look a skew at, also twist cord from the left Ba:ES 49 (expl. [[שׁ]], for normal [[שׂ]], as dissim. before [[ז]]), Jacob:Ar. Dichter i. 52);—Pt. [[שֵׁשׁ]] [[מָשְׁזׇר]] Ex 26:1, Ex 26:31, Ex 26:36 + 17 t. Ex (P); [[שֵׁשׁ]] om. Ex 39:24.
